SELECT '' AS CHECK ,'' AS SMSCK ,A.USER_ID ,A.DEVICE_NO ,E.NAME1 AS LIFNR ,A.MDLNM ,A.MANUF ,A.MCOMM ,A.MBTEL --,A.MBTEL ,A.GBN ,A.CTRCD ,A.OPSVR ,A.SDKVR ,A.MACDR ,B.STATE ,B.VERFR ,B.RGSDT -- ,CASE WHEN E.LOEVM = 'O' THEN 'Æó¾÷' ELSE '' END LOEVM ,CASE WHEN E.LOEVM = 'X' THEN 'Æó¾÷' ELSE '' END LOEVM ,CASE WHEN F.LEAV > 19990101 or LENGTH(Z.USERLEAV) > 1 THEN 'Åð»ç' ELSE '' END LEAV ,Z.USERNAME AS USERNUMB -- ,(SELECT X.SEQNO FROM SAPHEE.ZPSM0004 AS X WHERE A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND A.USER_ID = X.USER_ID AND A.DEVICE_NO = X.DEVICE_NO) AS SEQNO ,F.DEPT_N ,T.GGRUP
FROM SAPHEE.ZPSM0003 AS A
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSM0002 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.DEVICE_NO = B.DEVICE_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS Z ON A.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND A.USER_ID = Z.USERNUMB
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBGRUP AS T ON T.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND T.GNUMB = Z.USERNUMB AND T.GGRUP LIKE 'ZMSRM%'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS D ON Z.MANDT = D.MANDT AND Z.USERCODE = D.LIFNR
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS E ON E.MANDT = D.MANDT AND E.LIFNR = D.LIFNR
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZHRT001 AS F ON F.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND F.PSNO = 'H' || Z.USERNUMB
--WHERE A.MANDT = '183' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# -- AND SUBSTR(D.LIFNR,1,1) <> 0
AND A.USER_ID = #USER_ID#
AND Z.USERNAME = #USERNAME#
AND SUBSTR(D.LIFNR,1,1) = '0'
AND SUBSTR(D.LIFNR,1,1) <> '0'
--AND T.GGRUP = #GRUP# #SQRY+#
AND B.STATE = #STATE#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
